title: Episode #31 - "Bendyaman Franklin"
description:
On today’s installment of Million Dollaz Worth of Game Gillie poses a tough question forcing the cast to choose between their loved ones. Also, More details of Wallo’s “Personal Paulie” days emerge and Dev reveals the filthiest Hand Me Down item of ALL TIME.

Who are You Picking? (6:14)
Most Important Part of A Relationship (18:03)
Dividing Bills as A Couple (21:39)
Million Dollaz Worth Of Game: AIN’T NO FUN (31:16)
Hand Me Down Condoms (38:26)
What Rap Crew Would you be in? (41:23)
Top 5 Producers of All Time (46:58)
Stories From The Cell: Guilty By Association (1:01:55)

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

The Million Dollaz Worth of Game show, a weekly podcast with rapper Gillie Da King and social media influencer and disruptor Wallo267 (who are also first-cousins) targeting their combined social media presence of over 1.3 million followers.

Gillie and Wallo’s audiences have been demanding a podcast and this is the delivery.  For their audience, the Million Dollaz Worth of Game show bridges the gap between social media and reality tv, satiating the hunger for original and authentic content.
